name: Bulsatcom File Generator
description: Generates M3U and EPG files from Bulsatcom IPTV service with comprehensive configuration options.
overview: This plugin automatically generates M3U playlist and XMLTV EPG files from Bulsatcom IPTV service. Features include credential validation, configurable refresh intervals, content filtering, error handling, and a modern configuration interface.

versions.changelog: Implemented working Settings page following professional plugin patterns. Added EnableInMainMenu, MenuSection, MenuIcon, separate JS/HTML files, and proper configuration interface structure based on subbuzz plugin analysis.
Enhanced configuration interface with validation, error handling, and comprehensive settings. Added content filtering, debug options, and improved user experience.
